message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $10000. This is a special opportunity tailored to meet your needs while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at this price.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to negotiate further. Considering the mutual interests involved, we propose a price of $9000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product to you and our business objectives.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above $9000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me and the fact that you mentioned it's worth $8000 to you. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it at this price.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our position slightly. In light of your commitment and the value you see in the product, we're prepared to offer it to you for $8750. We believe this price reflects a balance between the product's value to you and our business interests.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm getting close to the sweet spot. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8750 and my previous offer of $8000. I'm thinking of $8375. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to commit to purchasing the product at this price.
